    R

    removeAnswer(String, Answer, String) - Method in class application.Answers
    Removes a specific answer from a given question if the user matches the answer's author.
    removeAnswers(String, String) - Method in class application.Answers
    Removes all answers associated with a given question.
    removeQuestion(Question, String) - Method in class application.Questions
    Removes a specific question if the given user matches the question's author
    removeReview(String, Review, String) - Method in class application.Reviews
    Removes a specific review from a question if the review belongs to the given user.
    removeReviews(String, String) - Method in class application.Reviews
    Removes all reviews for a given question if the user is the logged-in user.
    removeSolution() - Method in class application.Question
    Removes the solution from the question and marks it as unresolved.
    Review - Class in application
    The Review class represents a review written by a reviewer.
    Review(String, String) - Constructor for class application.Review
    Constructs a new Review object with the given text and reviewer name.
    Reviews - Class in application
    The Reviews class manages reviews for different questions.
    Reviews(String) - Constructor for class application.Reviews
    Constructs a new Reviews object for a given user.
